DATA.LIVE_TEXT: Hey dude! So... what are we doing exactly?
Y-Yeah, sorry! I was so excited to go traveling, I forgot to actually ask, hahaha!
Oohhh, I get it, I get it! So we're delivering stuff for people who can't travel around!
But... Don't you feel alone up here? If I wasn't here, then... there would be nobody, right?
